sentence: In Wisconsin, Democratic Senate candidate and Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry on Wednesday unveiled a plan "strengthening American Democracy" which includes ending the filibuster and other reforms."
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Democratic Senate candidates put changing the filibuster front and center

sentence: Mandela Barnes, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry have also supported scrapping the filibuster.

title: Democrats say change to filibuster just a matter of time

sentence: Two other contenders who can put their own money into the contest are state treasurer Sarah Godlewski, supported by women's groups, and Alex Lasry, whose family owns the Milwaukee Bucks professional basketball team.
author: Albert Hunt
title: Midterm primaries might be critical to balance of the Senate

sentence: Democrats have plenty of options, including Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who has made her appeal in rural areas a key argument for her campaign.
title: Opinion: Democrats cannot afford to blow it in Wisconsin's Senate race

sentence: One of her opponents, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, another Wisconsin Senate candidate, put it this way: We must have an understanding of a comprehensive plan that will deal with an influx of asylum seekers before any changes to Title 42 are made.?
